text: claremont appointment of police commission amend as amended by as amended by to read as follows establishment the city manager council of the city of claremont shall appoint for said city a police commission consisting of three persons the term of office of said commissioners shall be for three years and until their successors are appointed said commissioners shall have been residents of claremont for at least five years immediately preceding the date of their appointment not more than two of said commissioners shall be of the same political party any vacancy on said commission shall be filled in like manner for the unexpired term
